question: Which Indian organisation has commenced Crude oil production from Bengal basin?
explanation:
Oil and Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC) Limited has commenced crude oil production from the Asokenagar-1 well, Bengal Basin.
With this, the Bengal basin becomes Indiaâ€™s eighth producing basin, after Krishna-Godavari (KG), Mumbai Offshore, Assam Shelf, Rajasthan, Cauvery, Assam-Arakan Fold Belt and Cambay. ONGC discovers and produces crude oil from seven out of the eight producing basins.
